scripts.build: yarn hardhat clean && yarn hardhat compile
scripts.deploy:all: npm run deploy:verifiers:all && npm run deploy:registry && npm run deploy:registry:idcard && npm run deploy:hub:v2
scripts.deploy:hub: npx dotenv-cli -- bash -c 'yarn hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/hub/deployHub.ts --network ${NETWORK:-localhost} ${VERIFY:+--verify}'
scripts.deploy:hub:v2: npx dotenv-cli -- bash -c 'yarn hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/hub/deployHubV2.ts --network ${NETWORK:-localhost} ${VERIFY:+--verify}'
scripts.deploy:pcr0: npx dotenv-cli -- bash -c 'yarn hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/utils/deployPCR0.ts --network ${NETWORK:-localhost} ${VERIFY:+--verify}'
scripts.deploy:registry: npx dotenv-cli -- bash -c 'yarn hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/registry/deployRegistry.ts --network ${NETWORK:-localhost} ${VERIFY:+--verify}'
scripts.deploy:registry:idcard: npx dotenv-cli -- bash -c 'yarn hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/registry/deployIdCardRegistry.ts --network ${NETWORK:-localhost} ${VERIFY:+--verify}'
scripts.deploy:test:selfverificationroot: npx dotenv-cli -- bash -c 'yarn hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/deployTestSelfVerificationRoot.ts --network ${NETWORK:-localhost} ${VERIFY:+--verify}'
scripts.deploy:verifier:id: npx dotenv-cli -- bash -c 'yarn hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/verifiers/deployAllVerifiers.ts --network ${NETWORK:-localhost} ${VERIFY:+--verify}'
scripts.deploy:verifiers: npx dotenv-cli -- bash -c 'yarn hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/verifiers/deployVerifiers.ts --network ${NETWORK:-localhost} ${VERIFY:+--verify}'
scripts.deploy:verifiers:all: npx dotenv-cli -- bash -c 'yarn hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/verifiers/deployAllVerifiers.ts --network ${NETWORK:-localhost} ${VERIFY:+--verify}'
scripts.set:hub:v2: npx dotenv-cli -- bash -c 'NETWORK=${NETWORK:-alfajores} npx tsx scripts/setHubV2.ts'
scripts.set:registry: npx dotenv-cli -- bash -c 'NETWORK=${NETWORK:-staging} npx tsx scripts/setRegistry.ts'
scripts.set:registry:hub:v2: npx dotenv-cli -- bash -c 'yarn hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/scripts/updateRegistryHubV2.ts --network ${NETWORK:-localhost} ${VERIFY:+--verify}'
scripts.set:registry:idcard: npx dotenv-cli -- bash -c 'NETWORK=${NETWORK:-staging} npx tsx scripts/setRegistryId.ts'
scripts.set:verifiers:v2: npx dotenv-cli -- bash -c 'NETWORK=${NETWORK:-alfajores} npx tsx scripts/setVerifiersV2.ts'
scripts.test:airdrop: npx dotenv-cli -- bash -c 'TEST_ENV=${TEST_ENV:-local} npx hardhat test test/example/airdrop.test.ts'
scripts.test:attribute: npx dotenv-cli -- bash -c 'TEST_ENV=${TEST_ENV:-local} npx hardhat test test/unit/CircuitAttributeHandler.test.ts'
scripts.test:disclose: npx dotenv-cli -- bash -c 'TEST_ENV=${TEST_ENV:-local} yarn hardhat test test/integration/vcAndDisclose.test.ts'
scripts.test:endtoend: npx dotenv-cli -- bash -c 'TEST_ENV=${TEST_ENV:-local} yarn hardhat test test/Integration/endToEnd.test.ts'
scripts.test:example: npx dotenv-cli -- bash -c 'TEST_ENV=${TEST_ENV:-local} yarn hardhat test test/example/*'
scripts.test:formatter: npx dotenv-cli -- bash -c 'TEST_ENV=${TEST_ENV:-local} yarn hardhat test test/unit/formatter.test.ts'
scripts.test:hub: npx dotenv-cli -- bash -c 'TEST_ENV=${TEST_ENV:-local} yarn hardhat test test/unit/IdentityVerificationHub.test.ts'
scripts.test:integration: npx dotenv-cli -- bash -c 'TEST_ENV=${TEST_ENV:-local} yarn hardhat test test/integration/*'
scripts.test:pcr: npx dotenv-cli -- bash -c 'TEST_ENV=${TEST_ENV:-local} yarn hardhat test test/unit/PCR0Manager.test.ts'
scripts.test:register: npx dotenv-cli -- bash -c 'TEST_ENV=${TEST_ENV:-local} yarn hardhat test test/integration/commitmentRegistration.test.ts'
scripts.test:registry: npx dotenv-cli -- bash -c 'TEST_ENV=${TEST_ENV:-local} yarn hardhat test test/unit/IdentityRegistry.test.ts'
scripts.test:sdkcore: npx dotenv-cli -- bash -c 'TEST_ENV=${TEST_ENV:-local} yarn hardhat test test/sdk/sdkCore.test.ts --network localhost'
scripts.test:unit: npx dotenv-cli -- bash -c 'TEST_ENV=${TEST_ENV:-local} yarn hardhat test test/unit/*'
scripts.test:verifyall: npx dotenv-cli -- bash -c 'TEST_ENV=${TEST_ENV:-local} yarn hardhat test test/integration/verifyAll.test.ts'
scripts.update:cscaroot: npx dotenv-cli -- bash -c 'yarn hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/scripts/updateRegistryCscaRoot.ts --network ${NETWORK:-localhost} ${VERIFY:+--verify}'
scripts.update:hub: npx dotenv-cli -- bash -c 'NETWORK=${NETWORK:-staging} npx tsx scripts/setRegistry.ts'
scripts.update:ofacroot: npx dotenv-cli -- bash -c 'NETWORK=${NETWORK:-alfajores} npx tsx scripts/updateRegistryOfacRoot.ts'
scripts.update:pcr0: npx dotenv-cli -- bash -c 'PCR0_ACTION=${PCR0_ACTION:-add} PCR0_KEY=${PCR0_KEY} yarn hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/scripts/updatePCR0.ts --network ${NETWORK:-localhost} --reset'
scripts.upgrade:hub: npx dotenv-cli -- bash -c 'yarn hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/upgrade/deployNewHubAndUpgrade.ts --network ${NETWORK:-localhost} ${VERIFY:+--verify}'
scripts.upgrade:registry: npx dotenv-cli -- bash -c 'yarn hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/upgrade/deployNewRegistryAndUpgrade.ts --network ${NETWORK:-localhost} ${VERIFY:+--verify}'
